description: UI Redesign - Modern Wellness Aesthetic - Redesign the app with a cleaner, modern wellness-style aesthetic featuring cool pastel colors, flat card-based layout, pill buttons, and enhanced body diagram interactivity

userStories.title: Create New Color Palette
userStories.description: As a user, I want the app to use calming cool pastel colors so that the interface feels modern and wellness-focused.
acceptanceCriteria: Update appBackground to soft off-white (#F8FAFC / rgb 0.973, 0.980, 0.988)
Update appBackgroundSecondary to very light gray (#F1F5F9 / rgb 0.945, 0.961, 0.976)
Update cardBackground to white (#FFFFFF)
Update appAccent to soft blue (#6B9FD4 / rgb 0.420, 0.624, 0.831)
Update appSecondary to soft lavender (#A78BBA / rgb 0.655, 0.545, 0.729)
Update appSuccess to soft mint (#7DCFB6 / rgb 0.490, 0.812, 0.714)
Update appWarning to soft peach (#F4A683 / rgb 0.957, 0.651, 0.514)
Update textPrimary to dark slate (#1E293B / rgb 0.118, 0.161, 0.231)
Update textSecondary to slate gray (#64748B / rgb 0.392, 0.455, 0.545)
Update textMuted to light slate (#94A3B8 / rgb 0.580, 0.639, 0.722)
Remove or update warm earthy tone colors (old appAccent, appHighlight, zoneAvailable, etc.)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implement New Card Style
userStories.description: As a user, I want cards to be clean and minimal so that content is easier to scan and the interface feels less busy.
acceptanceCriteria: Create new SoftCardStyle ViewModifier with flat white background (Color.cardBackground)
Use 20pt corner radius for rounded appearance
Use minimal shadow: Color.black.opacity(0.04), radius 8, y offset 2
Remove gradient overlays and stroke borders from card style
Update NeumorphicCardStyle to use new SoftCardStyle implementation
Remove or deprecate GlassCardStyle modifier
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Typography System
userStories.description: As a user, I want typography to be clean and highly readable so that information is easy to consume at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Update SectionHeader to use .system(.title3, design: .rounded) with .bold weight
Update SectionHeader subtitle to use .system(.subheadline, design: .rounded)
Ensure SectionHeader uses new textPrimary and textSecondary colors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create Pill Button Styles
userStories.description: As a user, I want buttons to be pill-shaped and touch-friendly so that they are easy to tap and visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Update PrimaryButtonStyle to use Capsule shape instead of RoundedRectangle
Remove gradient fills from PrimaryButtonStyle - use solid appAccent color
Set minimum height of 48pt for touch accessibility
Use horizontal padding of 28pt
Keep subtle scale animation on press (0.97)
Update NeumorphicButtonStyle similarly (solid color, capsule shape)
Update NeumorphicSecondaryButtonStyle to use capsule with light fill (appAccent.opacity(0.1))
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Background Style
userStories.description: As a user, I want a clean, flat background so that the interface feels calm and uncluttered.
acceptanceCriteria: Update WarmGradientBackground to use single solid color (Color.appBackground)
Rename WarmGradientBackground to AppBackground (or keep name but change implementation)
Background should be flat off-white (#F8FAFC) matching new appBackground color
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Segmented Tab Control
userStories.description: As a user, I want the front/back toggle to be a clean segmented control so that it matches the modern aesthetic.
acceptanceCriteria: Update BodyViewTabButton to use solid appAccent color when selected (no gradient)
Unselected state: transparent background with textSecondary color
Update BodyViewTabs container to use appBackgroundSecondary for pill background
Add smooth animation when selection changes
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Home Screen Layout
userStories.description: As a user, I want the home screen to have clear visual hierarchy with generous spacing so that I can quickly find what I need.
acceptanceCriteria: Update VStack spacing to 24pt between major sections
Update horizontal padding to 20pt
Ensure all cards use the new soft card style (.neumorphicCard())
Update legendCard to use new card background color
Remove any remaining gradient or heavy shadow effects
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Enhance Body Diagram Interactivity
userStories.description: As a user, I want the body diagram to provide better visual feedback when I interact with it so that I feel confident about my selections.
acceptanceCriteria: Add pulse animation to recommended zone button using .animation with repeatForever
Add haptic feedback on zone tap using UIImpactFeedbackGenerator with .medium style
Add pressed state to zone buttons: scale(0.95) and opacity(0.8) when pressed
Add smooth transition animation when switching front/back views using .animation(.easeInOut)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Zone Button Design
userStories.description: As a user, I want zone buttons on the body diagram to be clean and easy to tap so that logging placements is effortless.
acceptanceCriteria: Update zone buttons to use flat solid backgrounds (remove gradients)
Update zoneAvailable color to soft gray-blue (#94A3B8 or similar)
Update zoneRecent color to soft peach (#F4A683)
Update zoneRested color to soft mint (#7DCFB6)
Recommended zone: add subtle border ring using appAccent color
Update dotted connector lines to use lighter color (textMuted.opacity(0.4))
Ensure zone buttons have minimum 48pt touch target
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Recommendation Card
userStories.description: As a user, I want the recommendation card to be prominent but not overwhelming so that I notice it without it dominating the screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Update RecommendationCard to use soft card style
Add subtle accent tint to background (appAccent.opacity(0.05))
Update 'Recommended' badge to use pill shape with solid appAccent background
Ensure location name uses new textPrimary color with rounded font
Add subtle icon (star.fill or checkmark.circle.fill) near recommendation
Remove heavy shadows or borders
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign History Screen Layout
userStories.description: As a user, I want the history screen to display placement records in clean, scannable cards so that I can quickly review my history.
acceptanceCriteria: Update history list items to use new soft card style
Each card shows: location name, date/time, optional note
Use color-coded circle indicator for location (matching zone colors)
Set card internal padding to 16pt
Set spacing between list items to 12pt
Update any filter UI elements to match new design system
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Patterns Screen Layout
userStories.description: As a user, I want the patterns/analytics screen to present data in clean stat tiles and simple charts so that insights are easy to understand.
acceptanceCriteria: Update all section cards to use new soft card style
Set spacing between sections to 24pt
Update DateRangePickerView preset buttons to use new colors and pill shape
Remove any heavy visual elements (gradients, dark shadows)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Compliance Score Display
userStories.description: As a user, I want the rotation score to be displayed as a clean progress ring with stat tiles so that my compliance is easy to understand at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Update progress ring to use new appAccent color for progress
Set ring stroke width to 10pt for better visibility
Use appBackgroundSecondary for background ring
Remove any gradient effects from the ring
Update score colors: red for <50 (#EF4444), appWarning for 50-75, appSuccess for >75
Add small icons to stat tiles (gauge for distribution, clock for rest compliance)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Redesign Heatmap Body Diagram
userStories.description: As a user, I want the heatmap visualization to use a clean color scale so that usage patterns are clear without being visually harsh.
acceptanceCriteria: Update heatmap color scale: gray (#94A3B8) at 0, lavender (#A78BBA) at 0.5, soft coral (#F4A683) at 1.0
Update HeatmapLegend gradient to match new color scale
Update ZoneDetailPopover to use frosted glass background (.ultraThinMaterial)
Ensure zone buttons use new heatmap colors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Zone Statistics List
userStories.description: As a user, I want zone statistics to be displayed as clean stat rows so that I can compare usage across zones easily.
acceptanceCriteria: Update progress bar fills to use new pastel heatmap colors
Set progress bar background to appBackgroundSecondary
Use rounded font for zone names (.system(.subheadline, design: .rounded, weight: .semibold))
Set minimum row height to 48pt for touch accessibility
Add small icon before each zone name using location.iconName
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update UsageTrendChartView Colors
userStories.description: As a user, I want the usage trend chart to use the new pastel colors so that it matches the overall design.
acceptanceCriteria: Update bar chart fill to use solid appAccent color (no gradient)
Update axis labels to use textSecondary color
Minimize grid lines (use very subtle appBackgroundSecondary color if needed)
Use cornerRadius on bars for softer appearance
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update LocationBreakdownChartView Colors
userStories.description: As a user, I want the location breakdown chart to use the new pastel colors so that it matches the overall design.
acceptanceCriteria: Update location color mapping to use new pastel palette
Use appAccent, appSecondary, appSuccess, appWarning, appInfo for different locations
Update axis labels to use textSecondary color
Minimize grid lines
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Status Badge Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want status badges to be clean pill shapes so that they are easy to read and visually consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Update StatusBadge to remove gradient fills - use solid color
Ensure capsule/pill shape is maintained
Set horizontal padding to 12pt, vertical to 6pt
Use .semibold font weight for badge text
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Confirmation Sheet Design
userStories.description: As a user, I want the placement confirmation sheet to be clean and focused so that confirming a placement is quick and clear.
acceptanceCriteria: Update PlacementConfirmationSheet background to use .ultraThinMaterial for frosted effect
Update confirm button to use new PrimaryButtonStyle (pill shape, solid appAccent)
Update cancel button to use secondary style (light fill, accent text)
Use rounded font for location name (.system(.title2, design: .rounded, weight: .bold))
Set generous spacing (24pt) between major elements
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Edit Sheet Design
userStories.description: As a user, I want the placement edit sheet to match the new design system so that the experience is consistent throughout the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Update PlacementEditSheet background to use .ultraThinMaterial for frosted effect
Update form fields to have clean, minimal styling with rounded corners
Update buttons to use new pill button styles
Ensure consistent padding (20pt) and spacing
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Tab Bar Styling
userStories.description: As a user, I want the bottom tab bar to match the new aesthetic so that navigation feels integrated with the overall design.
acceptanceCriteria: Set tab bar tint color to appAccent for selected items
Use textMuted color for unselected tab items
Ensure clean white or very light background for tab bar
Add .tint(Color.appAccent) to TabView
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update Success Toast Design
userStories.description: As a user, I want success messages to be clean and noticeable so that I have clear feedback when actions complete.
acceptanceCriteria: Update success toast background to use appSuccess color (solid, no gradient)
Maintain pill/capsule shape with generous corner radius
Use white icon and text
Keep smooth slide-in animation
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Final Design System Cleanup
userStories.description: As a developer, I want unused design components removed so that the codebase is clean and maintainable.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove deprecated warm earthy color definitions (old appAccent values if renamed)
Remove GlassCardStyle if no longer used
Ensure all color references in app use new palette
Add brief documentation comments to new design components
Verify all views compile and use consistent styling
Typecheck passes
